Nerangs.ab: surunuiiā̊ srešk-ē ī zōhr andar ǰīwdān rēzišn pas ǰīw andar zōhr kunišn nō yasnəm ahurāne ahurahe xšnuiiā̊.nō yasnəm ahurāne ahurahe upa.nō yasnəm āhīša āca.nō jamiiā̊ auuaŋhe aš.yeštica huiieštica hufrabərətica zaōϑranąm zōhr abāg skūrag kunišn

"At surunuiiā̊, he has to pour one drop of zōhr in the ǰīwdān and mix the consecrated milk with the zōhr (and continue with) nō yasnəm ahurāne ahurahe xšnuiiā̊.nō yasnəm ahurāne ahurahe upa.nō yasnəm āhīša āca.nō jamiiā̊ auuaŋhe aš.yeštica huiieštica hufrabərətica zaōϑranąm. He has to put zōhr in the saucer."

Quotations.ab: jīuu pad surunuiiā̊ andar rēzišn be pad dah-hōmāst abar ān ī pad vīspaiia ... āfrīnāmi andar rēzišn zōhrag čahār angust az āb ul dārišn ciyōn guft
"At surunuiiā̊ he has to pour jīw (zōhr), but in the Dō-Hōmāst service he should pour it in at vīspaiia ... āfrīnāmi. He should hold the zōhrag hold four fingers above the water, as was said.
